heading: We are qualified architectural technologists.
body: We offer independent thinking and creative design skills to maximise the value of projects. Working across a range of buildings types, we aim to deliver a practical and innovative design.
company_description: IPT Creative Ltd has THREE key values to impact our service which are Innovation, People and Tenacity. We offer independent thinking and practical design skills to maximise the value of projects. Working across a range of buildings types, we aim to deliver a practical and innovative design package aligned with the client brief and expectations.
caption: Architecture | BIM | Construction
